website_summaries.verdict: Nyko once again beats Nintendo to the punch by offering a two-in-one remote/MotionPlus design at the same price as an original Nintendo Wii remote controller.
pros: Combines Wii remote and MotionPlus into original design

customer_reviews.title: Good for people who need larger buttons
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I was a little leery going with a Wiimote by another company, but Nyko is the same brand that makes our battery chargers and rechargeable batteries for the Wii, and we've been using them since the same year Wii came out with no issues, so we gave this Wiimote a chance. This Wiimote is especially good for people who need larger buttons...or who can't see the markings on the standard Wiimote buttons. It does occasionally lose it's connection to the Wii...can't tell if that's more often than other Wiimotes do or not yet, but it doesn't seem to be. At half the price of a Wiimote from Wii, it's holding it's own so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Works...but inferior to Nintendo made model.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these. Got the first one for an incredible price. It worked, but the sensor just doesn't seem to be as sensitive as those manufactured by Nintendo. I notice this especially on Wii Golf. You have to hold it awkwardly to get it to work. Not really sure why I bought a second after my experience with the first. Guess I thought it might be different. It wasn't. Same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: I fixed the sensitivity issue with changing IR sensitivity, ...
customer_reviews.text: I fixed the sensitivity issue with changing IR sensitivity, but that interfered with my OEM Nintendo remotes, so I had to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can be buggy with some functions but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It can be buggy with some functions but it is a cheap remote that works very well. Duh, you may have to calibrate it as you would many other electronic motion sensing devices so not too sure what the complain is there.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with Wii, WiiU and Dolphin Emulator for PC
customer_reviews.text: I love this Wiimote, and it came with a free nunchuck from the seller. One of the best deals out there. It is compatible with Wii, Wii U and the Dolphin Emulator for PC. I haven't had one problem with it and it even comes with Nyko batteries. A steal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Aronne

customer_reviews.title: Not as sure or as reliably good as the original...
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say, but my first Nyko Wand, which needed the motion plus attachment, is much better than this motion plus ready one. A bit of a disappointment, but for an extra wand, it'll do.... -Eric
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could play Skyward Sword. It worked fine the first few days. Now it doesn't. This is the last time I buy off-brand in an attempt to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: arrived before the promise date and the kids started using it immediately. they loved the dual color and it works like all the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: dad2aaa

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you don't need a pointer.
customer_reviews.text: The Wand+ is great, but the pointer regularly doesn't show up. This is even more frequent in games where the pointer isn't used constantly, such as Monster Hunter Tri.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.O.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This remote works just like the official Nintendo version. And with much searching, I have found this to be the best price to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. Not quite as sensitive as the Original ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Not quite as sensitive as the Original Nintendo one, but very good.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperion

customer_reviews.title: Wii U & this dont mix
customer_reviews.text: Ehhhh , its okay sometime the WII U doesnt recognize it , but its cheap so itll do
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Nyko Wand+ for Wii
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this it was $12.72 . It works great and actually more responsive than the Wii remotes . Would buy more if needed
customer_reviews.author: Jack  M.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This controller is good, no problems with syncing or playing works as good as anything I've seen. Its a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: madav1138

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a good substitue for a real Nintendo product. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Cai

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son was able to use but unit broke down after some games.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Cabuhat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and material
customer_reviews.text: Work as well as the original one. Good quality and material. I like the holding feeling on the back of this remote. Nothing to complain. Especially the price beat everyone.
customer_reviews.author: diana rivas

customer_reviews.title: These were very poor quality. They would not stay connected to our ...
customer_reviews.text: These were very poor quality. They would not stay connected to our Wii system making it impossible to play games due to constant interruptions.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Eberenz

customer_reviews.title: Battery Eater
customer_reviews.text: This product is total waste of money, I read its review on Nyko Site and in review they put some articles published. As per these articles this product design is Very good and much better than the original manufacture. My experience with this product is real bad, It eats battery too fast. Where as original from WII is running with its original battery this Product has consumed multiple sets of Battery and still wants more. Also we have hard time to get it recognized by WII we have to press button 1 and 2 like ten times and keep it pressed I have no idea how to get rid of this, I am not recommending this product
customer_reviews.author: rajeev

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it works great. Sometimes it does not. It is unreliable so it gets used the least.
customer_reviews.author: Lukey

customer_reviews.title: Better and cheaper than Nintendo's brand.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, Nyko got to the "put the motion plus inside the Wiimote" idea before Nintendo did. This thing works perfectly! An excellent savings on controllers by going this route, I highly recommend them. EDIT: To perhaps redeem my down-rated review, let me note that this thing will NOT sync to a PC using a bluetooth dongle. The official Wiimotes will, and are very useful for playing your games on your PC via Dolphin (No tutorials here, sorry - but that should get you started).
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as the title describes
customer_reviews.text: No motion plus! The Nyko Wand+ is suppose to have motion control. This device is not compatible with wii sports resort. Amazon was very helpful and promptly paid for the return, I love Amazon for their return service. Bummer that I had to use it for this though, it was a christmas morning present.
customer_reviews.author: cukid9876

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the same reaction time as the original Nintendo controller. Sometimes doesn't stay turned on. It's ok for a temporary use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weik

customer_reviews.title: This does not have Wii Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheaper than the normal wii controllers expecting it to have Wii motion plus as advertised, wich is the whole reason I bought it the first place mind you. I then was disappointed at the fact that it is just an ordinary controller without motion plus. So dont buy this if you are looking for a cheap way to get wii motion plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias Torres

customer_reviews.title: I love Wand+  :p
customer_reviews.text: Very nices Wiimote and good prices. This wiimote is much better to the original wiimote.
customer_reviews.author: Juan del Pueblo

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the IR sensor
customer_reviews.text: I bought the NYKO Wand and immediately I was able to confirm that the cursor moves suddenly. I changed the Sensor Bar Sensibility in the Wii Menu to the left (minimum), and then I entered the Internet Channel for a few minutes (at least 5) to make a test. At some point the cursor became totally reliable. I returned the Sensor Bar Sensibility to default (in the middle) and made more tests in various shooting games (Goldeneye, Heavy Fire, Carnival King) the controller worked very good. I did not have any problems to make my shots go into my target. I hope this coment will be useful for "fix" the problem with the cursor.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel L. Piñera

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Remote
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these remotes a year ago and they have been terrible from the beginning. They drain batteries, even when not in use. They also turn off in the middle of use and we are always having to re-sync them to the Wii. Will not buy Nyko again.
customer_reviews.author: Utahgirl

customer_reviews.title: Wii wand+
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! I have never used the wii remote with motion plus so I don't have anything to compare it to. But it has worked fine for me. It doesn't stay synced well when you are transferring from the wii menu to the game. But one the game is on I never have had a disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: seve1241

customer_reviews.title: AVOID: Good motion control but IR fails.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I do not any longer recommended this controller, while the motion control works fantastic the pointer only appears half the time when trying to play titles like Metroid and Mario Galaxy, this totally ruins the experience. I thought it maybe was a fault product but I had it exchanged and the new one still suffers from the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Finstrom

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I HATE this controller! The built in motion plus is nice, but it uses to AA batteries in maybe 2 or 3 days. A TERRIBLE product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Darian

product_meta.title: Nyko Wand+ for Wii (White/Black)
product_meta.description: Experience the most advanced Wii Remote alternative in the world with the Nyko Wand+. The Wand allows for complete control of all compatible Wii software and menus and features full accelerometer control support, vibration feedback, and built-in speaker as well as Nyko?s new Full Motion Technology. Full Motion Technology provides 1:1 movement tracking fully compatible with all Wii Motion Plus games without the need for any extra dongles or add-ons. With the Wand in your hand, you'll have total control of all your Wii software as well as a rubberized B-Trigger, larger 1 and 2 buttons and an improved and re-worked d-pad for more comfortable and accurate classic and horizontal game play. The Wand is ergonomically crafted for left and right handed use with a form factor designed for maximum compatibility with 1st and 3rd party accessories. Expand your control possibilities with Nyko?s Trans-Port Technologies, exclusively developed for the Wand. Trans-Port Technology allows specially designed attachments to pass through key buttons to the attachment, allowing for more responsive attachments that can easily integrate with your Wand controller for a variety of games.
feature_bullets: Full compatibility with all Wii Software
Full Motion Technology for compatibility with all Wii Motion Plus games with no additional dongle
Trans-Port Technology allows for use of custom shells and accessories
Accelerometer for motion control game play
Trans-Port technology relocates key buttons & vibration to specially designed accessories for more immersive control & compatibility
Full-Motion technology provides advanced 1-to-1 movement detection for the most accurate motion control input
Fully compatible with Wii MotionPlus & all Wii software
